Summary: Evil librarian I.M. Meen, who hates kids and learning, has placed you, his latest kid victim, into his dungeon maze. Over the course of 36 levels, fight various monsters, correct pages of misspelled text and save other kids there.

Title: The Jungle Book: The New Adventures of Mowgli

Title: 20, 000 Leagues Under the Sea

Title: Casper Brainy Book
Summary: Interactive storybook based on the movie Casper (1995).

Summary: This is the fourth installment in the World Heroes fighting game series

Summary: A pinball game with Timon and Pumbaa.

Title: Kolibri

Title: Tails' Skypatrol

Title: VW Sharan: Pack 'n Puzzle
Summary: Advergame published by Volkswagen to promote the first generation of the Volkswagen Sharan. You have to combine people with stuff (for example a girl and her teddy bear) so you can put it

Title: Clock Tower

Title: Cutthroat Island

Summary: Snobbish teen snoop Elena Gilbert begins to suspect that her small quiet town of Fell's Church, Virginia have been infiltrated by vampires. One of them wants her dead but the other wants her love.

Title: Virtual Corporation

Title: Intimate Possibilities
